data_maturity_score.evidence: IBM is a large enterprise with established BI/DW practices, but focus on traditional Cognos stack suggests defined rather than cutting-edge maturity. Cloud mentioned as nice-to-have indicates transition phase.

data_maturity_level.evidence: Score of 3 indicates defined maturity level with documented processes and established practices, consistent with IBM's enterprise consulting model

maturity_signals.evidence: IBM Consulting delivery centers imply structured governance and enterprise-grade practices for client work

scope_creep_score.evidence: Well-defined BI data engineer role focused on Cognos development and reporting. Clear separation between required and preferred skills.

overtime_risk_score.evidence: IBM generally has good work-life balance, but consulting roles can have client-driven deadlines. No specific overtime warnings mentioned.

role_clarity.evidence: Focused Business Intelligence data engineer role with specific responsibilities in analysis, reporting, and Cognos development

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Low to moderate risk - established company, clear role definition, but location restriction and traditional tech stack may limit growth

reporting_structure_clarity.evidence: No specific reporting structure mentioned in job posting, only mentions working with business and technical team members

manager_level_inferred.evidence: No mention of specific manager level or reporting structure in the job description

team_growth_velocity.evidence: IBM Consulting delivery centers typically have stable team structures for client work, no expansion signals mentioned

team_composition.evidence: Working in IBM Consulting delivery centers suggests project-based teams that vary by client engagement

reporting_structure.evidence: No specific reporting structure mentioned in job posting

cross_functional_embedded.evidence: IBM Consulting model involves embedding with client teams and working closely with business and technical stakeholders

work_life_balance_score.evidence: IBM is known for good work-life balance policies and employee benefits, though consulting can have variable hours

growth_opportunities_score.evidence: Large enterprise with structured career paths, but traditional BI focus may limit exposure to modern data stack

tech_culture_score.evidence: Enterprise-focused with traditional BI practices (Cognos), but mentions cloud and modern ETL tools as preferred skills

tech_culture_signals.evidence: No specific tech culture signals mentioned - no OSS, conferences, or innovation programs discussed

dev_practices_mentioned.evidence: No specific development practices mentioned - focus is on BI development and client delivery

innovation_signals.evidence: Traditional BI focus with Cognos, cloud mentioned as nice-to-have suggests maintaining existing systems rather than innovation

tech_debt_awareness.evidence: No mention of modernizing systems, improving code quality, or addressing technical debt

ai_integration_level.evidence: No mention of AI, ML, or modern data science capabilities - purely focused on traditional BI and reporting

ml_tools_expected.evidence: No ML tools mentioned - focus is entirely on BI/reporting tools like Cognos

hiring_urgency.evidence: No urgent timeline mentioned, standard enterprise hiring process expected

competition_level.evidence: IBM is prestigious employer in India, but location-limited to Pune and specific Cognos skills required narrows candidate pool

company_stage_inferred.evidence: IBM is a large, established enterprise company with global consulting operations

hiring_velocity.evidence: IBM Consulting typically has steady hiring for delivery centers to support ongoing client work

team_size_signals.evidence: IBM Consulting delivery centers typically have substantial teams, though exact size varies by location

funding_stage_signals.evidence: IBM is a publicly traded, established enterprise company

role_creation_type.evidence: Consulting delivery centers expand teams based on client demand and project pipeline

strength_details: IBM is a prestigious, stable enterprise employer with global presence
Clear role definition focused on BI data engineering with specific skill requirements
Opportunity to work on diverse client projects in consulting environment
Strong brand name value for career progression
concern_details: Heavy focus on traditional Cognos BI stack may limit exposure to modern data engineering
Onsite requirement in Pune, Maharashtra limits flexibility and remote work options
Unclear career growth path and reporting structure
No mention of compensation, benefits, or work-life balance policies
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers (3-5 years) with BI/DW experience seeking stable enterprise role
Cognos specialists looking to work with diverse clients in consulting environment
Engineers in Pune area seeking established company with good reputation
probe_details: Ask about compensation range and benefits package
Understand reporting structure and team hierarchy
Clarify current tech stack and modernization plans
Discuss work hours, overtime expectations, and client delivery timelines
Explore career progression opportunities within IBM Consulting
leverage_details: Strong Cognos Developer & Admin skills are specific and valuable for this role
Being already located in Pune eliminates relocation concerns
summary.overall_assessment: Solid opportunity for mid-level BI data engineer at prestigious enterprise company. Good for candidates seeking stable consulting work with established technology stack. Main trade-offs are traditional tech focus, location restriction, and unclear growth path. Strong fit for Cognos specialists in Pune area.
